meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vivid.
meanings.sent1: The vividness of the colors in the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The vividness of the memory made it feel like it happened yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The vividness of the clown's outfit made the children burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The vividness of her storytelling painted a picture in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The vividness of the fireworks display left us in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality of being bright, distinct, and clear.
meanings.sent1: The vividness of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The vividness of the image on the screen made it seem almost real.
meanings.sent3: The vividness of the neon sign made it impossible to miss.
meanings.sent4: The vividness of her eyes revealed the depth of her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The vividness of the sunlight streaming through the window filled the room with warmth.
